author: shelmwanza
title: AMM and Crowdsend DApp
description: Cardano does not have an Automated Market Maker(AMM) for AMMs and a DApp that sends funds to 2 to 500 addresses in one transaction(tx).
solution: We want to build an AMM that gives users access to DeFi products on 1 platform and allows users to send funds to 2 to 500 wallets in 1 tx.
experience:
BSc Honours in Economics 2015
Introduction to Digital Currencies (2020 UNIC MOOC) 
Introduction to Decentralised Finance (2021 UNIC MOOC)
